download.management

Class DatasetDownloadStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • download.management.DatasetDownloadStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Download, java.io.Serializable

    public class DatasetDownloadStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements Download, java.io.Serializable
    Representation of status of dataset download.
    Author:
    Karem Terry
    See Also:
